Module com.example.software2
Package com.example.software2

Class AddCustomer

java.lang.Object
com.example.software2.AddCustomer
public class AddCustomer extends Object
The controller for the form to create and edit Customers. It is created as a Create form, and is changed to an Edit form when a CustomerInstance is set with setCustomer

      Parameters:
      customer - the CustomerInstance the user wants to edit

    • getCustomer

      public CustomerInstance getCustomer()
      Get the finished CustomerInstance. Use `wasCanceled` to check if this function will return an updated/valid instance
      Returns:
      the submitted CustomerInstance

    • setDivisions

      Parameters:
      divisions - a list of DivisionInstances used in the combo box

      Set the CountryInstances that the form will display
      Parameters:
      countries - a list of CountryInstances used in the combo box

    • onSubmitButton

      public void onSubmitButton()
      The handler for the submit button. This function validates all form values make sense, and there won't be parsing issues, and will show an error box if there is an issue. If all validations succeed, update the CustomerInstance that will be returned and close the stage (window)

    • wasCanceled

      public boolean wasCanceled()
      Get if the cancel button was pressed
      Returns:
      whether the cancel button was pressed

    • onCancelButton

      public void onCancelButton()
      The handler for the Cancel button. It sets the wasCanceled variable, and closes the stage.
